resources.string: The first run of this application requires the internet. The internet will also be required for some operations on subsuquent runs.
This application requires installing the Rivet app first.
There was a problem with the Core Service in the Rivet app, causing a RemoteException.
An operation in progresss with the Core Service in the Rivet app was interrupted, causing a exception.
An unexpected error in the system casued an exception.
